snippet.title: Midnight Ramen Official Trailer
snippet.description:
In "Midnight Ramen", you play the role of a ramen stall owner who interacts with customers coming and listens to their troubles. However, amidst helping the customers, there seem to be some matters in your own life as well...
---
Steam Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2543030/Midnight_Ramen/?utm_source=youtube
---
About Cointinue Games：
Cointinue Games is a small game studio founded in late 2023, dedicated to developing enjoyable and entertaining games.

Currently, we are in the process of creating our debut narrative-driven healing game: "Midnight Ramen." Our goal is to bring a unique perspective to the world of gaming.
